if(!require("leaflet")){
    options(repos=c(CRAN="https://cloud.r-project.org"))
    install.packages("leaflet")
    stopifnot(require("leaflet"))
}
kyoto_longitude <- 135.7681
kyoto_latitude  <- 35.0116
leaflet() |>
  addTiles() |>
  setView(kyoto_longitude, kyoto_latitude, zoom=6) |>
  addPopups(kyoto_longitude, kyoto_latitude, 
            "I'm a Doctoral student visiting <b>Baruch College</b>, but my mind often drifts to the serenity of <b>Kyoto, Japan</b>!")
